name: Data Analyst
description:
Requirements:

  • Data collection & preparation: coordination of data delivery to BI, communication with responsible data providers.
  • Data transferring improvement.
  • Data quality monitoring, research of data quality improvement ways.
  • Deliver qualitative and timely business data analysis.• Ensure high quality reporting, dashboards testing & tuning-up with development & support team.
  • Technical task setting to BI support team
  • Advising users using the Project BI dashboards, problem solving
  • Mobile app redesign process coordination: technical task, testing, delivery to end user.
  • Delivery of data for mobile app on regular basis with respective timing.
  • Optimization of data delivery process.
  • Process establishment for bonus relevant data delivery, verification and calculation
  • Processing document flow related to Project BI App & Project Mobile App.

Desired skills and competencies:

  • Analytical skills;
  • Advance Excel knowledge;
  • Attention to details and accuracy;
  • Good communication skills, proactivity;
  • Fluent Russian and English (oral and written).
  • Experience in working with any analytical tools, reporting or BI (Qlik Sense - as advantage).
